title: I would like dominion please.
body: Hey, Riot. I would like to have dominion to play, because you know it's a game mode, that is in your in your game. I believe that i should be able to play it a long with Twisted Treeline and all the other metric tonnes of other random game modes you release. I don't want no excuse like "But there aren't enough players interested in Dominion" When there has not been any chance to play dominion and test how many people play it. So please make it a thing because i would enjoy it.

replies.body: Yes i am to the same likey me sum dom doms. Rito plox

You can play Dominion in custom games.

Play with friends, or find more people on forums or in chat rooms that will join you.

You could start your own 'queue' while you wait for Rito to make an official one.
Or Riot can just let us queue for it like most likely every other server can.

> [{quoted}](name=Blindturkey,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=29AJE4TV,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-10T18:43:15.964+0000)
>
> Or Riot can just let us queue for it like most likely every other server can.

Oh, okay, so you're just too lazy to find people for a game, got it.

If you want to play Dominion now, there's ways to do it.

Have fun!

>I don't want no excuse like "But there aren't enough players interested in Dominion" When there has not been any chance to play dominion and test how many people play it.

You realise Riot has statistics about this sort of stuff, right? Go join a custom game. Dominion queue isn't happening, face it and grow up.
